Oak_Lawn.Burr Oak station: Burr Oak is a station along the Blue Island Branch of the Metra Electric line in Calumet Park, Illinois. The commuter rail station is located on Burr Oak Avenue near Lincoln Street, and is 18.36 miles (29.55 km) away from the northern terminus at Millennium Station. In Metra's zone-based fare system, Burr Oak is in zone D. It borders the City of Blue Island.
